name: Die and Roll
description:
Die & Roll is a small "Endless Runner".  Collect coins, dodge walls and jump over pits and obstacles! 

While originally the idea was to use the dice rolls at the end of the run to further improve your score, it couldn't be done in time.

Still, it is in my opinion a pretty fun platformer, I hope that you agree! 

Controls: 

- Up Arrow to jump

- Right and Left Arrows to move to the sides

Developed by Sol Flora López.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AKA_CuenkaFlor
